data.title: Ted Hartley Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Ted Hartley on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Ted Hartley including Tales from the Crypt: Ritual.
data.text: Theodore Ringwalt Hartley is a U.S. Navy fighter pilot, investment banker, actor, film producer, and CEO of RKO Pictures. He was married to heiress, actress and philanthropist Dina Merrill until her death in 2017. His last acting credit was 2012 and his last producing credit was in 2015.
